law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] The income or any surplus of funds belonging to or in the custody of the commonwealth shall, unless otherwise provided, be added to the principal. Chapter 29: Unappropriated income [ Text of section as recodified by 2012, 165, Sec. 112 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The income or any surplus of funds belonging to or in the custody of the commonwealth shall, unless otherwise provided, be added to the principal.
